data.name: Outbreak - Danger Close Flashlight and Laser
data.detailed_description: Gain an advantage in the nightmare with a flashlight or laser that detects nearby threats. They will turn from white to red when enemies are near, giving you additional time to prepare or flee. You can choose to equip either individually or as a pair. To use this DLC, access the Character Customize screen via the "Customize" button in the single player or multiplayer lobby screens.
data.about_the_game: Gain an advantage in the nightmare with a flashlight or laser that detects nearby threats. They will turn from white to red when enemies are near, giving you additional time to prepare or flee. You can choose to equip either individually or as a pair. To use this DLC, access the Character Customize screen via the "Customize" button in the single player or multiplayer lobby screens.
data.short_description: Gain an advantage in the nightmare with a flashlight or laser that detects nearby threats.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended.
